device.overview: The definitive Android flagship of 2025, featuring a refined titanium build and the most advanced AI integration in the Galaxy series.

specs.label: Display
specs.description: An expansive, ultra-bright screen with a 144Hz refresh rate and improved anti-reflective coating for outdoor visibility.

specs.label: Camera
specs.description: A professional-grade sensor capable of 8K video and incredible 100x Space Zoom with AI-driven stabilization.

specs.label: Battery
specs.description: Optimized for long-lasting performance with 65W super-fast wired charging support.

specs.label: RAM
specs.description: High-speed LPDDR5X memory designed to handle intensive on-device AI processing and gaming.

specs.label: Storage
specs.description: Generous UFS 4.0 storage for high-resolution media and professional applications.
